articles.title: 2024 Bajaj Pulsar N250 launched in three new colours - BikeWale
articles.description: Besides all the mechanical updates it received, the Chakan-based bike maker introduced a variety of three new shades of the bike.
articles.content:
- All colours are priced the same
- Get a new set of decals
- Costs Rs. 1.51 lakh (ex-showroom)
